Iwobi on scoring to send Nigeria to the World Cup: "The moment was crazy, I remember running off celebrating. I almost cried to see how the fans were reacting, to see my mum and dad in the stands, it was just an amazing feeling."

Iwobi on Nigeria: "It’s my homeland, so it’s always an honour to wear the white and green. I’ve seen so many kids on the street screaming “go Nigeria”, so to represent them I’m just proud."

Iwobi: "It was like everyone won the lottery, they were just jumping. To go to the World Cup you can see it’s not just the players’ dream, it’s the fans’ dream as well."
